lorem: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed ac purus sit amet nisl tincidunt tincidunt. Nullam nec purus.
library_empty_subtitle: Pick a style to get stated
select_photo_subtitle: To get started, upload 8-20 high quality photos of yourself
select_photo_hint: Upload both portrait and full body photos with your face clearly visible
select_photo_error_hint: Make sure your face is clear and the lighting is good
upload_photo_error_subtitle: Something went wrong, please try again
enable_notifications_content_2: Enable notifications so we can let you know when your photos are ready
delete_account_content: If you clear your data you will lose all your photos. You can't undo this action.
default_email_contact_pattern: Please send us an email at <email> and we will get back to you as soon as possible!
buy_credits_content_1: Every week, your credits will refill and you will receive **<credits> credits**
buy_credits_content_2: If you don't want to wait, you can buy additional credits any time
good_photos_subtitle: We need close-up selfies of the same person, taken from a variety of angles and with different facial expressions and backgrounds
good_photos_subtitle_portrait: We need a few **HIGH QUALITY** close-up selfies of the same person looking straight at the camera
good_photos_subtitle_full_body: We need a few **HIGH QUALITY** full-body shots of the same person, with different clothes and backgrounds
good_photos_subtitle_side: We need a few **HIGH QUALITY** shots of the same person from different angles (e.g. from the side, from above, looking down, etc)
bad_photos_subtitle: Group pics, sunglasses, animals, face small or not fully visible, nudes, kids, blurry pics
hiw_content_1: Upload photos of yourself in a few poses to build your own AI profile
hiw_content_2: AI learns your unique facial features and creates hot photos of you
precache_subtitle: This will only take a sec...
select_gender_subtitle: We use this information to suggest the AI filters that will work best for you
report_content_content: Reporting this will notify our team, and we will look into it
delete_pack_content: Deleting this pack will remove the content from your library
post_pro_subtitle: You are now a Hotify PRO member
post_pro_content_1:
As a PRO member, you will receive
**<count> credits** every week
post_pro_content_2: You can use these credits to generate HOT pics of yourself with any AI filter you want
post_pro_ty: Thank you for joining Hotify PRO ‚ù§
photo_permission_not_granted_subtitle:
Please grant permission to your photos
to pick and upload images
vip_code_valid_content: Your code has been redeemed successfully!
editor_select_photo_subtitle: Choose a photo to start editing
editor_coming_soon_subtitle: Photo editing tools will be available here
editor_loader_eta_not_stuck: Sometimes edits take longer, but everything is working fine!
magic_eraser_instructions: Highlight the area you want to remove, then press Erase
magic_brush_hint: What do you want to add?
magic_brush_instructions: Highlight the area you want to change and describe what you want to add
magic_wand_hint: How do you want to change the photo?
magic_wand_instructions: Describe how you want to change the photo, then press Apply
reset_profile_content: Resetting your AI profile will let you pick new photos and start over. This will cost {credits} credits. Continue?
create_style_name_title: Pick a name for your new style
create_style_prompt_title: Add a prompt for this style
create_style_gender_title: Who is this style designed for?
create_style_gender_warning: Make sure your prompt works well for both genders (e.g. clothes, accessories, etc)
create_style_intro_content_1: Submit your own AI style to our library, where anyone can use it
create_style_intro_content_2: Everytime someone uses your style, you get a share of the credits
create_style_summary_award:
Everytime someone uses your style,
you get awarded **{award} credits**
create_style_prompt_hint: Describe the style you want to create
report_style_content: Reporting this style will notify our team, and we will look into it
photo_analysis_scanning_subtitle: This will only take a moment...
photo_analysis_styles_count:
Based on your unique traits
 we found **{count} Styles** that perfectly suit you
photo_analysis_error_subtitle: We couldn't analyze your photo. Please try again.
onboarding_redeem: Have a code? Redeem it here
